snippet.title: "loom" by o s (deuveir) - longplay
snippet.description:
loom is an ambient video game by o s (also known as deuveir)

get the game: https://deuveir.itch.io/loom
get loom's original soundtrack: https://deuveir.bandcamp.com/album/loom-soundtrack

follow o s:
http://pluslorem.wiki/
https://twitter.com/deuveir

i tried showcasing each of the 12 environments with some care, but unfortunately i feel like i rushed a bit of the last few ones for the sake of pacing. i encourage you to buy this and play it for yourself! it's a great experience that gives a very different feeling when you walk through the areas yourself (and clip out of some to have extra fun). it's really cool how the game kind of taunts you to enjoy the areas by putting their exits really close to the spawn most of the time. it's like it's asking you to just be there for just a while longer.

this recorded playthrough was my 3rd overall.
